title: Start
body:
<<BGM GlobalStats Neutral>>
<<layerSet Dialogue 2>>
<<outfit Aig Casual>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
<<flip Kent>>
<<move Aig StageRight2>><<move Kent StageLeft2>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Aig.
<<flip Aig>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig RLWF>>
Miss Kent! I didn't hear you come in.
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent NHNF>>
Aig, we need to talk.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NONF>>
Oh, uh...s-sure.
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
Aig, I don't want to rattle you a week out from your debut, but I just have to be blunt.
<<expression Kent NHNF>>
I don't know where you fit in this band.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig ROWF>>
W-what do you mean.
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent RONF>>
I mean, marketing has no idea how to package you.
<<expression Kent NONB>>
Look, all around you're doing... fine... in your training, but not you're not a standing out in anything.
<<expression Kent NHNF>>
You can move, but you're not really a "dancer."
You can sing, but you're not a "Singer" with a capital 'S.'
And you've got a little bit of a fan following, but...
<<expression NONB>>
...well, you're not J-Pe.
<<expression NHNF>>
Do you see what I'm, saying?
->I'm trying to be well-rounded.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NHNF>>
    I always thought that I could be the "well-rounded one."
    <<expression Aig NSNF>>
    You know, a little bit of this, a little bit of that.  
    <<expression Aig NONF>>
    That's a thing...right?
    <<name Friendship Kent>>
    <<expression Kent RSNF>>
    Oh, Aig.
    Do you know what another word for "well-rounded" is?
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    You mean, like, jack of all-
    <<name Friendship Kent>>
    <<expression Kent NNNF>>
    Boring.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig RONF>>
    Boring?
    <<name Friendship Kent>>
    <<expression Kent RNNF>>
    Boring.
    <<expression Kent NHNF>>
    <<expression Aig NNNF>>
    Trust me, nobody has ever succeeded in this business by being "the well-rounded one."
    <<expression Kent NHNB>>
    Survived, maybe, but certainly not succeeded.
    <<expression Kent NNNF>>
    And I get it, it's important to have SOME skills across the board. You don't want to be the one slowing down the band when it's go time.
    <<expression Kent RHNF>>
    But you don't want to be...boring.  You get me?
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NONF>>
    I... think so?
->I think so.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NONB>>
    I... guess so.
    <<expression Aig NNNF>>
    You're saying I'm not good at anything?
    <<name Friendship Kent>>
    <<expression Kent RSNF>>
    Exactly!

title: Good
body:
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
Look, at the rate you're going, I have no doubt you'll do well at the debut concert.
<<expression Kent RHNF>>
But if you want to have a successful career after that, you're going to have to start carving out more of niche for yourself.
<<expression Kent RSWF>>
Stand out from your bandmates!  Find something that is uniquely "Aig."
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NONF>>
How do I do that?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent RNNF>>
Specialize.
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
Get good at something... anything.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NONF>>
What should I specialize in?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent RHWU>>
I don't care. Just pick something.
<<expression Kent NHNF>>
Whatever you're best at, whatever you have the most fun doing... it really doesn't matter.
Anything is better than nothing.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NLNF>>
Okay. I'll give it a try.
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent RSNF>>
Good. Now get to it.
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
You've only got one week left before you're debut, so crunch time.
<<expression Kent RSWF>>
Exciting! Right?
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NONB>>
Y-yeah. Exciting.
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
Riiiiight.
<<expression Kent ANNF>>
But seriously. Crunch time.
<<flip Kent>>
<<expression Kent ANNB>>
Hop to it!
<<expression Kent ANNF>>
<<move Kent OffStageLeft>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
...
<<expression Aig NONB>>
...yeesh.

title: Bad
body:
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
<<expression Kent RHNF>>
Look, at the rate you're going, I doubt you'll even get past your debut concert.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig ROWF>>
Wait, what?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent NHNF>>
But even if your career DOESN'T die in the cradle, you won't make it much further without having a marketable persona.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NONF>>
So... what should I do?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Specialize.
Get good at something... anything.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
What should I specialize in?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent RHWU>>
I don't care. Just pick something.
<<expression Kent NHNF>>
Whatever you're best at, whatever you have the most fun doing... it really doesn't matter.
Anything is better than nothing.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
Okay. I'll give it a try.
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
Good. Now get to it.
You've only got one week left before you're debut, so crunch time.
<<flip Kent>>
Get back to work.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig ROWF>>
W-wait! Miss Kent!
<<flip Kent>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent RNNF>>
Hmm?
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NONF>>
You really don't think we'll make it past the debut?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression RNWB>>
...
<<expression Kent RNWF>>
I never said that.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig AONF>>
Yes you did.
Like... not even thirty seconds ago.
<<name Friendship Kent>>
...
<<expression Kent AHSF>>
Aig, I don't have time for this.
<<flip Kent>>
<<expression Kent NNNB>>
<<expression Aig ANNF>>
I'll talk to you later, m'kay?
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
<<move Kent OffStageLeft>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
...
<<expression Aig ANNB>>
...right.
